class.name: HaulRoadConditionData
class.meta: name=ASA_SUMMARY_UNIQ unique=true columns=FILEID, STARTTIME_UTC, ENDTIME_UTC tablespace=MW_IDXENT
Summarised FPO Haul Road Severity Index data

property.name: summaryIndex
property.meta: An index into this list of data sets.

property.name: startTime
property.meta: true
The utc time at which this data starts.
The time at which this data starts.
true

property.name: endTime
property.meta: true
The utc time at which this data ends.
The time at which this data ends.
true

property.name: rackingCount0
property.meta: The number of racking exceptions to exceed management limit 0.

property.name: rackingCount1
property.meta: The number of racking exceptions to exceed management limit 1.

property.name: rackingCount2
property.meta: The number of racking exceptions to exceed management limit 2.

property.name: biasCount0
property.meta: The number of bias exceptions to exceed management limit 0.

property.name: biasCount1
property.meta: The number of bias exceptions to exceed management limit 1.

property.name: biasCount2
property.meta: The number of bias exceptions to exceed management limit 2.

property.name: exceptionCount0
property.meta: The total number of exceptions to exceed management limit 0.

property.name: exceptionCount1
property.meta: The total number of exceptions to exceed management limit 1.

property.name: exceptionCount2
property.meta: The total number of exceptions to exceed management limit 2.

property.name: maxRacking2
property.meta: pressure
The maximum racking value over 2 seconds in length.

property.name: maxRackingTime
property.meta: The utc time at which the maxRacking2 event occurred.
The time at which the maxRacking2 event occurred.
true

property.name: totalPayload
property.meta: mass
The total payload carried during this sample period.

property.name: conditionIndex
property.meta: The haul road condition index calculated from the data.

property.name: minRacking
property.meta: pressure
The minimum racking value during the sample period.

property.meta: pressure
The minimum bias value during the sample period.

property.meta: pressure
The minimum pitch value during the sample period.

property.meta: pressure

property.meta: pressure
The minimum Right Front Suspension Cylinder Pressure during the sample period.

property.meta: The lowest gear recorded during the sample period.
